overview:
Roger Williams is an entrepreneur, internationally recognized commercial aviation expert and loyalty marketing specialist.

Roger is a co-founder of aviation consultancy, Airline Information, LLC, host company for loyalty, distribution and payments conferences for the aviation industry. He has also managed an active consulting portfolio with major airlines and suppliers since 2004.

Roger’s latest venture is a gamification/loyalty company called Link Loyalty founded in 2011. Roger developed a patent-pending process to allow emarketers to shorten hyperlinks on their website and assign loyalty points or instant rewards to them.

Roger’s early airline experience included multiple and diverse roles with Air Jamaica, including network planning, alliances and loyalty marketing. Roger created unique co-branded credit card programs as well as co-branding music labels and acts with airline brands such as Virgin Atlantic. Roger co-founded the music talent agency Off the Menu Entertainment, where he developed and popularized the “celebrity DJ” concept in the early 2000s.
